title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 347.3 - Payment of outstanding amortization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 347.3 - Payment of outstanding amortization

State Regulations

On or before each November 15th thereafter, in addition to
the amount due for the current year billing and for the payment of the annual
amortized installment, the Comptroller shall advise each participating employer
of amortization amount still outstanding and be authorized to accept the
prepayment of any balance remaining to be paid by December 15th of that year, including interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
347.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
